0010ede0-88bf-8000-fff5-7f0000014e7a.name: AIA Extraction Execute Vision Prompt Wrapper

_a-0000ed5d-bd1b-8000-9c80-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_Extraction_GeneratePromptEntities
_a-0000ed5d-bd1b-8000-9c80-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
"## Output Format

Your final output must be a single **JSON object** representing the extracted data, with each field enriched to include its location. The schema for the response is as follows:

" &
/*"```json" &*/
"
" & rule!AIA_Extraction_CreateJsonSchema(
  fields: ri!fields,
  mode: ri!mode,
  returnJson: true
) & "
"&
/*"```"&*/
""

_a-0000eed9-05f0-8000-9d10-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_DefaultModel

_a-0000ee5d-151c-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_FieldJsonSchema
_a-0000ee5d-151c-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!isMultiple: a!defaultValue(
    ri!item.isMultiple,
    false
  ),
  local!baseType: #"53aa98e0-80da-4eb1-88f9-a989a8fe1aee"(
    type: ri!item.type
  ),
  local!baseField: a!map(
    title: ri!item.label,
    description: ri!item.description,
    type: local!baseType.type,
    format: local!baseType.format
  ),
  local!schemaType: displayValue(
    ri!mode,
    rule!AIA_ENUM_FieldSchemas().name,
    rule!AIA_ENUM_FieldSchemas(),
    null
  ),
  local!type: #"53aa98e0-80da-4eb1-88f9-a989a8fe1aee"(
    type: ri!item.type,
    isMultiple: local!isMultiple,
    includeArrays: ri!includeArrays,
    mode: ri!mode
  ),
  local!enum: rule!AIA_Extraction_GetFieldOptions(ModelVersionField: ri!item),
  local!columns: reject(
    fn!isnull,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      ri!item.columns,
      a!match(
        value: fv!item,
        whenTrue: a!isNullOrEmpty(index(fv!value, "key", null)),
        then: null,
        whenTrue: and(
          ri!operation = cons!AIA_PROMPT_OPERATION_MODE_MULTIMODAL,
          a!defaultValue(fv!value.useVision, false) = true
        ),
        then: fv!item,
        whenTrue: and(
          ri!operation = cons!AIA_PROMPT_OPERATION_MODE_TEXT,
          a!defaultValue(fv!value.useVision, false) = false
        ),
        then: fv!item,
        default: fv!item
      )
    )
  ),
  local!properties: if(
    and(
      a!isNotNullOrEmpty(local!schemaType.fields),
      or(
        and(
          not(local!isMultiple),
          a!isNullOrEmpty(local!columns),
        ),
        not(a!defaultValue(ri!includeArrays, true))
      )
    ),
    reduce(
      #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:update",
      a!map(),
      merge(
        local!schemaType.fields.key,
        a!flatten({
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
            local!schemaType.fields,
            a!map(
              type: a!defaultValue(fv!item.type, local!baseField.type),
              description: fv!item.description,
              format: if(
                fv!item.useFormat,
                local!baseField.format,
                null
              ),
              items: if(
                and(
                  a!isNullOrEmpty(fv!item.type),
                  ri!includeArrays = false
                ),
                rule!AIA_FieldJsonSchema(
                  item: ri!item,
                  mode: cons!AIA_SCHEMA_MODE_PLAIN,
                  operation: ri!operation,
                  includeArrays: true
                ).items,
                null
              ),
              enum: if(
                fv!item.useFormat,
                index(local!enum, "options", null),
                null
              ),
            )
          )
        })
      )
    ),
    null
  ),
  local!required: if(
    and(
      a!isNotNullOrEmpty(local!schemaType.fields),
      a!isNullOrEmpty(local!columns),
      not(local!isMultiple)
    ),
    reject(
      fn!isnull,
      index(
        local!schemaType.fields.key,
        where(local!schemaType.fields.required)
      )
    ),
    null
  ),
  local!items: a!match(
    value: ri!includeArrays,
    equals: false,
    then: null,
    whenTrue: and(
      a!isNotNullOrEmpty(local!columns),
      ri!includeArrays
    ),
    then: a!map(
      type: "object",
      properties: reduce(
        #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:update",
        a!map(),
        merge(
          local!columns.key,
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
            local!columns,
            rule!AIA_FieldJsonSchema(
              item: fv!item,
              mode: ri!mode
            )
          )
        )
      ),
      required: reject(
        fn!isnull,
        index(
          local!columns.key,
          where(local!columns.required)
        )
      )
    ),
    whenTrue: local!isMultiple,
    then: a!localVariables(
      local!item: rule!AIA_FieldJsonSchema(
        item: #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:update"(
          ri!item, 
          {"label", "description", "isMultiple"},
          {null, null, false}
        ),
        mode: ri!mode
      ),
      if(
        and(
          a!isNullOrEmpty(local!schemaType.fields),
          a!isNotNullOrEmpty(local!enum)
        ),
        #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:update"(
          local!item,
          "enum",
          index(local!enum, "options", null),
        ),
        local!item
      )
    ),
    default: null
  ),
  a!map(
    title: local!baseField.title,
    description: local!baseField.description,
    type: local!type.type,
    format: local!type.format,
    properties: local!properties,
    items: local!items,
    required: local!required
  )
)

_a-0000ee6e-3b90-8000-9bac-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_CreateMaxPageValidation
_a-0000ee6e-3b90-8000-9bac-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!feature: displayvalue(
    ri!feature,
    rule!AIA_ENUM_Features().id,
    rule!AIA_ENUM_Features(),
    null
  ),
  rule!AIA_CreateValidation(
    instance: ri!Instance,
    typeId: cons!AIA_VALIDATION_TYPE_ID_EXECUTION,
    message: rule!AIA_CreateValidationErrorMessage(
      type: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:25266106-b29b-4b80-9261-5c5b2e4b0aa3",
      error: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:73bdf5e0-f073-4e93-aa40-bdbfabbff2d3"(
        #"urn:appian:translation-variable:v1:aac5d80e-8573-4620-81a7-245a7684ce13": local!feature.label,
        #"urn:appian:translation-variable:v1:881cf1e3-d211-453b-b21c-24f0ad928cd1": a!defaultValue(
          ri!maxPages,
          local!feature.maxPages
        )
      )
    ),
    severity: local!feature.severity
  )
)

_a-0000ec2d-5396-8000-9bdc-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_Extraction_GetInstanceById
_a-0000ec2d-5396-8000-9bdc-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryRecordByIdentifier"(
  recordType: recordType!AIA Extraction Instance,
  identifier: ri!identifier,
  fields: a!flatten(
    {
      /* Extraction Instance */
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.modelVersionId,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.documentId,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.statusId,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.hasBoundingBoxes,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.boundingBoxesDocumentId,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.validationErrors,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.accuracy,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.precision,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.f1,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.recall,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.createdOn,
      /* Extraction Fields */
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.modelVersionFieldId,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.extractedValue,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.overrideValue,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.overrideNull,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.boundingBox,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.confidence,
      /* Extraction Fields > Rows */
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.rows.overrideValue,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.rows.boundingBox,
      /* Extraction Fields > Rows > Cells */
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.rows.cells.modelVersionFieldId,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.rows.cells.extractedValue,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.rows.cells.overrideValue,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.rows.cells.overrideNull,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.rows.cells.confidence,
      /* Extraction Fields > Model Field */
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.modelVersionField.key,
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.modelVersionField.columns.key,
      /* Extraction Fields > Rows > Cells > Column */
      recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fields.rows.cells.column.key,
      a!defaultValue(ri!additionalFields, {})
    },
    
  )
)

_a-0000ee6e-3b90-8000-9bac-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_ENUM_Features
_a-0000ee6e-3b90-8000-9bac-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
{
  a!map(

    severity: cons!AIA_SEVERITY_HIGH

    maxPages: cons!AIA_ADVANCED_IDP_PAGE_MAX,
    severity: cons!AIA_SEVERITY_HIGH
  ),
  a!map(
    id: cons!AIA_FEATURE_AI_REVIEW,
    label: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:a67c9f85-f682-4191-bed6-c4912e7d88b4",
    severity: cons!AIA_SEVERITY_MEDIUM
  ),
  a!map(
    id: cons!AIA_FEATURE_SEARCH_QUERY,
    label: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:7d663cf5-06ab-4445-979d-17074d9928f9",
    maxPages: cons!AIA_ADVANCED_IDP_PAGE_MAX,
    severity: cons!AIA_SEVERITY_HIGH
  ),
  a!map(
    id: cons!AIA_FEATURE_CLASSIFICATION,
    label: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:f04e5814-41aa-4705-bb0e-968fe8fc8ec5",
    maxPages: cons!AIA_CLASSIFICATION_MAX_PAGE_COUNT,
    severity: cons!AIA_SEVERITY_HIGH
  ),
  a!map(

    label: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:8375b3de-d2a7-415d-983d-71e16d015d7e",
    severity: cons!AIA_SEVERITY_MEDIUM
  )
}

_a-0000ec36-59aa-8000-9be0-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_Test_GetLatestExtractionModelVersion

_a-0000ecea-6c5f-8000-9c4b-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_Extraction_GeneratePromptExamples
_a-0000ecea-6c5f-8000-9c4b-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!examples: rule!AIA_GetModelVersionExamples(
    modelVersion: ri!modelVersion,
    fields: ri!fields
  ),
  if(
    /*even if there are no bounding boxes, still include the examples*/
    a!isNullOrEmpty(local!examples),
    "",
    "

Here are some examples:
" & joinarray(
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        local!examples,
        "
  <example>
    <input>" & fv!item[recordType!AIA Model Version Example.input] & "</input>
    <output>" & fv!item[recordType!AIA Model Version Example.output] & "</output>
  </example>"
      ),
      "
"
    )
  )
)

_a-0000ee6e-3b90-8000-9bac-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_IsExtractionInstance

_a-0000ee3e-060c-8000-9bb8-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_Extraction_CreateJsonSchema

_a-0000eca1-71bf-8000-9c0b-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_Extraction_BoundingBoxesInstructions
_a-0000eca1-71bf-8000-9c0b-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
="
- " & #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:f430adf5-5028-4f82-9579-6d5a30d46b00" & "
    - " & #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:6701bdd2-dc86-46fd-b918-39ee518ddfc0" & " <example>{..., ""brokerBranch"": {""value"": ""some branch name"", ""spanId"": ""abcd1234""}, ...}</example>
    - " & #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:fb5aa790-a812-42e8-b713-144b1e9f11ff" & " <example>[{""column1"": ""value"", ""column2"": ""value"", ..., ""columnN"" : ""value"", ""spanId"": ""abc1234""}, ...]</example>
    - " & #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:7fdc7b4d-ae4b-482c-8042-2df75a693468" & " <example>[{""value"": ""item"", ""spanId"": ""abc1234""}]</example>
- " & #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:9c5e3486-fcad-4bf4-ab97-eb0e6f2ec8fd" & "

<example>
{
  ""field1"": {""value"": ""field 1 value"", ""spanId"": ""ABCD1234""},
  ""field2"": {""value"": ""field 2 value"", ""spanId"": ""DEFG1234""},
  ""table1"": [
    {""column1"": ""col 1 value"", ""column2"": ""col 2 value"", ""spanId"": ""GHIJ1234""},
    {""column1"": ""col 1 value"", ""column2"": ""col 2 value"", ""spanId"": ""JKLM1234""},
  ],
  ""table2"": [
    {""column1"": ""col 1 value"", ""column2"": ""col 2 value"", ""column3"": ""col 3 value"", ""spanId"": ""MNOP1234""},
    {""column1"": ""col 1 value"", ""column2"": ""col 2 value"", ""column3"": ""col 3 value"", ""spanId"": ""PQRS1234""},
  ],
  ""list1"": [
    {""value"": ""First value"", ""spanId"": ""ABCD1234""},
    {""value"": ""Second value"", ""spanId"": ""QRST5678""}
  ],
  ""list2"": [
    {""value"": ""First value"", ""spanId"": ""EFGH1234""},
    {""value"": ""Second value"", ""spanId"": ""IJKL5678""},
    {""value"": ""Third value"", ""spanId"": ""IJKL5678""}
  ]
}
</example>
"

_a-0000ec2d-5396-8000-9bdc-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_Extraction_GeneratePrompt
_a-0000ec2d-5396-8000-9bdc-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!promptMap: rule!AIA_Extraction_GeneratePromptMap(
    sectionInstance: ri!sectionInstance,
    sectionFilter: ri!sectionFilter,
    operation: ri!operation,
    modelVersion: ri!modelVersion,
    hasBoundingBoxes: ri!hasBoundingBoxes,
    ExtractionInstance: ri!ExtractionInstance,
    batch: ri!batch
  ),
  local!promptMap.role & rule!AIA_PROMPT_SECTION_DIVIDER() & 
  local!promptMap.entities & rule!AIA_PROMPT_SECTION_DIVIDER() & 
  local!promptMap.instructions & rule!AIA_PROMPT_SECTION_DIVIDER() & 
  if(
    a!isNotNullOrEmpty(local!promptMap.examples),
    local!promptMap.examples & rule!AIA_PROMPT_SECTION_DIVIDER(),
    ""
  )
)

_a-0000ec1e-9975-8000-9bd6-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_Extraction_PromptInstructions

_a-0000ecf1-11b9-8000-9c4e-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_Test_GetLatestExtractionInstanceWithFields

_a-0000ed57-1773-8000-9c7e-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_Extraction_VisionInstructions
_a-0000ed57-1773-8000-9c7e-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
="- " & #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:37e1cfad-08b7-4397-bcee-4dd175e4f0e8" & "
- " & #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:f5505f0e-9119-4a41-8953-ec5ef8f2d904" & " <example>{..., ""brokerBranch"": {""value"": ""some branch name"", ""pageNum"": ""1""}, ...}</example>
- " & #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:0f4e0ba0-b7aa-45a9-9087-95883107d7e6" & " <example>[{""column1"": ""value"", ""column2"": ""value"", ..., ""columnN"" : ""value"", ""pageNum"": ""2""}, ...]</example>
- " & #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:d92f05d6-36f5-47d4-8a63-e1320620aebc" & " <example>[{""value"": ""item"", ""pageNum"": ""3""}]</example>
- " & #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:9202de9d-b760-4db0-b0a6-9c958417d630" & "

<example>
```json
{
  ""field1"": {""value"": ""field 1 value"", ""pageNum"": ""1""},
  ""field2"": {""value"": ""field 2 value"", ""pageNum"": ""2""},
  ""table1"": [
    {""column1"": ""col 1 value"", ""column2"": ""col 2 value"", ""pageNum"": ""3""},
    {""column1"": ""col 1 value"", ""column2"": ""col 2 value"", ""pageNum"": ""3""},
  ],
  ""table2"": [
    {""column1"": ""col 1 value"", ""column2"": ""col 2 value"", ""column3"": ""col 3 value"", ""pageNum"": ""4""},
    {""column1"": ""col 1 value"", ""column2"": ""col 2 value"", ""column3"": ""col 3 value"", ""pageNum"": ""5""},
  ],
  ""list1"": [
    {""value"": ""First value"", ""pageNum"": ""2""},
    {""value"": ""Second value"", ""pageNum"": ""2""}
  ],
  ""list2"": [
    {""value"": ""First value"", ""pageNum"": ""1""},
    {""value"": ""Second value"", ""pageNum"": ""1""},
    {""value"": ""Third value"", ""pageNum"": ""1""}
  ]
}
```
</example>"

_a-0000ec2d-5396-8000-9bdc-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_Test_GetLatestExtractionInstance
_a-0000ec2d-5396-8000-9bdc-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AIA_Extraction_GetInstanceById(
  identifier: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryRecordType_v3"(
    recordType: recordType!AIA Extraction Instance,
    pagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(
      startIndex: 1,
      batchSize: 1,
      sort: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
          field: recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.id
        )
      }
    )
  ).data[recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.id],
  additionalFields: {
    recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.instanceUuid,
    recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.modelVersion.versionId,
    recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.modelVersion.modelId,
    recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.modelVersion.uuid,
    recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.modelVersion.extractionModel.key,
    recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.documentFolderId,
    recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.fieldCount,
    recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.sections,
    recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.boundingBoxes,
    recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.responseDocumentId,
    recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.sourceDocumentId
  }
)

_a-0000ee21-294f-8000-9bb6-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_Extraction_AddTokens
